Description: Problems where the app or interface malfunctions during normal use, such as freezing, blank screens, crashes, or pages not loading correctly. Excludes login/authentication failures or service-wide outages unless clearly tied to UI malfunction.
Inclusion Criteria: User reports app screens freezing, blank or crashing while trying to use features or settings; performance issues localized to the client experience rather than access credentials or billing.

Description: Situations where the user cannot log in or complete authentication due to password, 2FA, or login errors. Excludes general app crashes unrelated to sign-in.
Inclusion Criteria: Mentions of password reset links failing, 2FA codes not arriving, accounts locked despite correct credentials, or email login failures.

Description: Issues about money taken or returned: unexpected fees, duplicate charges, incorrect invoices, or refund denials. Excludes cancellation requests unless the main concern is the charge itself.
Inclusion Criteria: Complaints about unexpected charges, billing twice, invoice mismatches, refund denials, or undisclosed fees.

Description: Requests to cancel service, stop renewals, or downgrade to a cheaper/free plan. Includes cases where cancellation was attempted but charges or renewals continued. Excludes pricing disputes without explicit cancellation intent.
Inclusion Criteria: User explicitly asking to cancel, end subscription, stop renewals, or move to a free tier, including frustration that cancellation options are missing.

Description: Physical fulfillment issues such as damaged items, wrong items, missing deliveries, or stalled shipment tracking. Excludes digital delivery or billing issues.
Inclusion Criteria: Reports of damaged shipments, incorrect items, packages marked delivered but missing, or tracking numbers not updating.

Description: Suggestions or requests for new or improved functionality. Excludes troubleshooting existing broken features.
Inclusion Criteria: User asks for new modes, integrations, customization options, export formats, or similar product improvements.

Description: Messages sent to the wrong department or about a different service than intended. Excludes disputes about policy content.
Inclusion Criteria: User notes they contacted the wrong team/inbox or asks to be routed elsewhere; mentions request pertains to a different service.

Description: Difficulties following help instructions or onboarding steps because guidance is unclear or mismatched. Excludes authentication failures unless tied to unclear instructions.
Inclusion Criteria: Mentions that help pages don't match the app, onboarding asks for unavailable info, or instructions are unclear; user needs better guidance.

Description: Reports that the entire service is unavailable or not loading for the user/team, suggesting a broader outage. Excludes isolated app crashes or personal network issues.
Inclusion Criteria: User cannot access anything, nothing loads, or asks about known outages affecting multiple users or teams.

Description: Notes expressing satisfaction, gratitude, or compliments about the product or support. Excludes issue-focused messages with only minor praise.
Inclusion Criteria: User explicitly thanks or praises updates, workflow improvements, or support responsiveness without raising a substantive problem.

Description: Complaints about policies or conflicting information from teams, such as cancellation rules or sales vs support promises. Excludes general billing errors unless framed as policy unfairness.
Inclusion Criteria: User feels misled by cancellation policy, cites conflicting statements from sales/support, or disputes terms presented during purchase.
